client
Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
  client.ClientController

public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object

Represents controller of client network aplication. Offers metodes which makes loggining to server and edits client's database. These actions are performed by communication handler of client.

setUserDataAndGroups

public void setUserDataAndGroups(java.lang.String userdata,
                                 boolean setuser)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Performs actions such as adding user and his groups to local cache after loginnig to server if his database did not existed.

Parameters:
userdata - string representation of data which server sends to as respond.
setuser - if true, user will be added to local cache after loggining when his database file did not exists. If false his database file have already exists so information about him and his calendar were used from it and there is no need to download them from server.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

addEvent

public void addEvent(java.lang.String eventname,
                     java.util.Date date,
                     boolean repeating,
                     int often,
                     int category)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Sends the event addition request to server or adds it to local cache according to connection status. Adds event to pending event' additions list.

Parameters:
eventname - string representation of event's name.
date - Date representation of date.
repeating - boolean representation event's repeating.
often - integer representation of numbers of hours to repeat event.
category - integer representation of event's category
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
